Package index

Data Loading & Cleaning

load_car_data()
Load and clean the Car Evaluation dataset from UCI
clean_column_names()
Cleans and standarizes column names for the loaded data.
check_data_quality()
Check data quality by detecting NA values and duplicate rows
save_cleaned_data()
Save the cleaned data to a specified file path.

Data Encoding

encode_levels()
Encode categorical variables with predefined levels.
encode_safety()
Encode the safety variable.
decode_categorical_features()
Decode Categorical Features
count_unique_values()
Count Unique Values

Exploratory Data Analysis

plot_distribution()
Plot Distribution

Data Splitting & Modeling

split_data()
Split data into training and test sets
cross_validate_knn()
Perform k-fold cross-validation for kNN
compute_test_accuracy()
Compute Test Accuracy
calculate_random_baseline()
Calculate baseline accuracy
train_final_model()
Train final kNN model using caret

Evaluation & Visualization

plot_conf_matrix()
Plot Confusion Matrix
summarize_data()
